Articles.Content: How to make your (lack of) writing more interesting to read according to Oxford Academy.

Oh, IFLS regurgitating regurgitated articles.

It's the burning sulfur flow of the Ijen volcano. Poor people mine the sulfur there with barely any breathing protection.

I've grown to hate IFLS with time... Fun at First, but the perpetual lack of any sources or actual scientific explanation brings this website close to the pseudo-science usually on TV

Not to mention the multiple neverending rrrrrrrrrrrreposts

I hadn't read this, so at least they're doing some good.

In any case, PB, I think your threads would be more successful if you included a bit more commentary at the top and/or a picture from the article.
